languages.text: {n}Члены культов смерти, расплодившихся в столичном мире, вышли на улицы и закружились в священном танце — клинки их свистели, обрывая жизни неверных. Творился великий ритуал прославления Его.{/n}
{n}The death cultists of the capital world took to the streets and swirled in a sacred dance, their blades whistling as they cut short the lives of the wicked — a great ritual to praise His name.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Члены культов смерти, расплодившихся в столичном мире, вышли на улицы и закружились в священном танце — клинки их свистели, обрывая жизни неверных. Творился великий ритуал прославления Его.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The death cult members of the capital world took to the streets and swirled in a sacred dance, their blades whistling as they cut short the lives of the infidels. A great ritual was being performed to celebrate their devotion.{/n}

{n}The death cultists of the capital world took to the streets and swirled in a sacred dance, their blades whistling as they cut short the lives of the wicked — a great ritual to praise His name.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Todeskultisten der Hauptwelt wirbelten in einem heiligen Tanz durch die Straßen und beendeten mit ihren Klinge das Leben der Gottlosen ... in einem grandiosen Ritual zu Ehren Seines Namens.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The death cultists of the capital world took to the streets and swirled in a sacred dance, their blades whistling as they cut short the lives of the wicked — a great ritual to praise His name.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Todeskultisten der Hauptwelt wirbelten in einem heiligen Tanz durch die Straßen und beendeten mit ihren Klinge das Leben der Gottlosen ... in einem grandiosen Ritual zu Ehren Seines Namens.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les cultistes de la mort du monde-capitale sont descendus dans la rue, où ils se sont livrés à une danse sacrée, fendant l'air de leurs lames à mesure qu'ils abrégeaient l'existence des mécréants dans le cadre d'un grand rituel en Son honneur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The death cultists of the capital world took to the streets and swirled in a sacred dance, their blades whistling as they cut short the lives of the wicked — a great ritual to praise His name.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les cultistes de la mort du monde-capitale sont descendus dans la rue, où ils se sont livrés à une danse sacrée, fendant l'air de leurs lames à mesure qu'ils abrégeaient l'existence des mécréants dans le cadre d'un grand rituel en Son honneur.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los cultistas de la Muerte del mundo capital salieron a las calles en un baile sagrado. Sus hojas silbaban al cortar las vidas de los malvados en un ritual en alabanza de Su nombre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The death cultists of the capital world took to the streets and swirled in a sacred dance, their blades whistling as they cut short the lives of the wicked — a great ritual to praise His name.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los cultistas de la Muerte del mundo capital salieron a las calles en un baile sagrado. Sus hojas silbaban al cortar las vidas de los malvados en un ritual en alabanza de Su nombre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}首都惑星の死のカルト信者たちは通りに繰り出し、聖なる踊りを繰り広げ、邪悪な者たちの命を断ち切る彼のように、刃を鳴らす…それは主の名を称える偉大なる儀式だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The death cultists of the capital world took to the streets and swirled in a sacred dance, their blades whistling as they cut short the lives of the wicked — a great ritual to praise His name.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}首都惑星の死のカルト信者たちは通りに繰り出し、聖なる踊りを繰り広げ、邪悪な者たちの命を断ち切る彼のように、刃を鳴らす…それは主の名を称える偉大なる儀式だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}首都世界的拜死教教徒走上街头，在神圣的舞蹈中不断旋转。他们的利刃发出了呼啸的声音，收割着恶人的性命，这便是赞颂不死之神圣名的伟大仪式。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The death cultists of the capital world took to the streets and swirled in a sacred dance, their blades whistling as they cut short the lives of the wicked — a great ritual to praise His name.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}首都世界的拜死教教徒走上街头，在神圣的舞蹈中不断旋转。他们的利刃发出了呼啸的声音，收割着恶人的性命，这便是赞颂不死之神圣名的伟大仪式。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Başdünyadaki ölüm tarikatçıları; sokaklara dökülüp kutsal bir dansa başladı, palalarıyla ıslıklar çalıp kötü niyetlilerin canlarını almaya koyuldu. O'nun adını yüceltmek için büyük bir ayin tertip ettiler.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The death cultists of the capital world took to the streets and swirled in a sacred dance, their blades whistling as they cut short the lives of the wicked — a great ritual to praise His name.{/n}
